𝘓𝘦𝘥 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘈𝘱𝘱 𝘚𝘵𝘰𝘳𝘦 𝘖𝘱𝘵𝘪𝘮𝘪𝘻𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯(𝘈𝘚𝘖), 𝘉𝘳𝘢𝘯𝘥 & 𝘗𝘦𝘳𝘧𝘰𝘳𝘮𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦 𝘮𝘢𝘳𝘬𝘦𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘢 𝘉2𝘊 𝘍𝘢𝘳𝘮𝘦𝘳 𝘈𝘱𝘱–𝘕𝘪𝘯𝘫𝘢 𝘒𝘪𝘴𝘢𝘯

• Conducted competition & keyword research to identify high-traffic, low-competition KWs, boosting app visibility
• Analyzed app store data and Optimized creatives & metadata, uplifting organic search rank for core keywords
• Developed custom store & localized listings tailored for specific themes & languages, improving conversion rates by 20%
• Leveraged data analytics, customer feedback & A/B tests to stabilize uninstalls & scale organic installs to 40K/month
• Conducted user research to uncover insights on category behavior, pain points, media consumption, App usage, etc.
• Developed distinctive brand identity & messaging based on insights from user research and competition analysis
• Developed regionalized content for Perf. marketing, resulting in a 20% drop in CPI and a 15% increase in conv. rates
• Collaborated with Agri influencers on branded content, improving branded search vol by 40% & Conv. rate by 18%
• Leveraged Firebase analytics to stabilize D0 Uninstalls and W1 Retention, optimizing campaigns by pausing underperformers, refining communication, and reallocating budgets.

A Study on Supply Chain Management In Construction Industry
A Study on Supply Chain Management In Construction Industry
Jan 2019 - Apr 2019
Jan 2019 - Apr 2019
My project team studied the feasibility of applying supply chain management principles to a Prefabricated construction project. We concentrated on the demand management and inventory management aspects of the project. We applied techniques like value chain mapping and inventory management model (Economic batch Quality ) to effectively reduce wastage and improve productivity at the contraction site.
